info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Small Bird
Punishing Bird
collection.openText: People have been committing sins since long ago. “Why do they commit sins, knowing it's wrong?"

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an employee entered the Containment Unit of another Abnormality, $0’s Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When #0 fell into a panic, $0’s Qliphoth Counter lowered.
$0 voluntarily returned to its containment after a panicking employee returned to normal; it also returned after a period of time had passed.
#0 was ordered to suppress $0. When they tried to attack it, the central portion of the Abnormality split and <Redacted>. Afterward, #0 was confirmed to have died. The suppression ended in failure.
